actions.text: On agreeing to the Klein (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 159 (Roll no. 1068).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Klein (FL).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Klein (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 159 (Roll no. 1068).

description: Page 2, after line 7, in the item in the table of contents relating to section 202, strike "STATE AND REGIONAL" and insert "QUALIFIED".***.
purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to make technical and conforming changes; add a new title which inserts new provisions on reinsurance coverage for qualified reinsurance programs; and to insert provisions requiring a study on the need for conditional coverage of commercial residential lines of insurance.
